ssot__MarketJourneyActivity__dlm.name: Market Journey Activity
ssot__MarketJourneyActivity__dlm.description: The Market Journey Activity DMO represents a step or activity within a journey in Salesforce Journey Builder.

ssot__CreatedDate__c.description: The record’s creation date and time.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to a logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID to the logical name of the object where the record originated, for example, a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID to an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID to the system where the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the business account.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date and time when the user last modified the record.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the Market Journey Activity.

ssot__MarketJourneyActivityNbr__c.description: The number of the activity in Journey Builder.

MarketJourneyId__c.description: A reference ID for the journey in Journey Builder.

ssot__Name__c.description: The name of the journey activity.
